Welcome!


I'm a third-year Engineering Student at the University of Waterloo. I've previously worked at Splunk and PagerDuty as a Software Engineering Intern and I'm always looking for unique opportunities to apply my skills and learn some more.

I'm particularly interested in building highly reliable and scalable systems, however I'd love to hear from you if you believe I'd be a good fit for additional opportunities.
